name: We Do It Our Own Way EP!
description:
Scream the Headlines are a four piece Rock band from Wales, who released their first EP `We Do It Our Own Way´last month and this is all down to their hard work, grit and passion.

The EP starts off with Liars, which sets the listener up for whats to come from the world of Scream the Headlines. There´s no confusion, just straight forward rock at full throttle that thrusts through until the end. A fast tempo with driven guitars and strong drumming. A catchy melody is thrown into the mix that will get you hooked in no time. The vocals are on key all the way in this immense overall track. Your Bullshit Lacks Intelligence consists of a fast tempo and preppy yet catchy melody that you cant help but like. This track reminds me a little of You Me At Six, which isn’t a bad thing. They most definitely have their pop rock sound down to a T. It doesn’t miss a beat at any point and keeps rocking forward until the last note.

Stand Tall shows off skillful and clever guitars off the first chord. It delivers a fast tempo that matches up to its counterparts. A tight rhythm section that ploughs through strongly and work well together. Another catchy melody that will have you on your feet in no time, then throw in a guitar fueled ending to complete the piece. Learn to Drown is a perfect track to close the EP with. Guitar driven from start to finish with its skillful, powerful drumming to boot. The track has no intention of slowing and moves through until the silence without breaking its flow.

All four of the tracks work well and hold their own personality. There isn’t anything bad to say about this EP albeit I wish it held more tracks of the same caliber. I can see the band growing from strength to strength and also perfecting `their´ sound even more every step of the way.

So…go grab a copy and support these guys talent because you wont regret it.

Http://www.youtube.com/screamtheheadlines

name: Pembrokshire Mermaid - ASH
description:
Image inspired by the place we live and the tattoos we have.

Illustrated by Lee Philips
Instagram: @leejohnphillips

100% cotton pre-shrunk jersey knit. Seamless twin needle 7/8" collar. Taped neck and shoulders. Twin needle sleeve and hem bottoms. Quarter turned to eliminate centre crease.


Small - 34-36" chest
Medium - 38-40" chest
Large - 42-44" chest
X Large - 46-48" chest
